job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>SUMMARY:</strong>&nbsp;Apex Systems has an immediate opening for a Machine Learning Engineer&nbsp;for a client in the financial services industry. The position is a contract-to-hire, offering a competitive compensation package. The successful candidate must come from a machine learning environment and have Java development experience.</p><p><br></p><p>This is a great opportunity to get your foot in the door with a large IT company to grow with internally!</p><p><br></p><p><strong>***<u>Must be USC or Green Card No C2C</u>****</strong></p><p><br></p><p><strong>ROLE:</strong> Machine Learning Engineer</p><p><strong>TERM: </strong>Long term contract to hire</p><p><strong>LOCATION:&nbsp;</strong>Remote (company in Rockville, MD)</p><p><br></p><p><strong>QUALIFICATIONS:</strong></p><p><br></p><ul><li>Bachelor's/Master's degree in Computer Science or related field.&nbsp;</li><li>Core Java </li><li>4+ years Machine Learning experience</li><li>AWS Core Services</li><li>Experience with web based technologies, specifically HTML</li></ul>
